content: I've been thinking about upgrading my storage to an SSD for a while now, and I think you've convinced me to take the plunge. Before I do, I just want to make sure I have a reliable backup system in place. I recently received an external hard drive, a 2TB Western Digital drive, which I've set up to back up my important files and documents on a weekly schedule. Do you think this setup is sufficient, or should I consider additional backup options?
